column4: can some one help me with creating startup programs through sessions? im kind of lost at what to do at this point
what do you want to start?
are you using ubuntu or kubuntu
ok, you need to go to System -> Preferences -> Sessions
you can click add, in the startup programs tab
Give it a name (Konversation or IRC or something like that), and then put in the command to launch konversation
if you don't know where the binary is, you can open a terminal and type "which konversation" and that will give you the path
Ok, what would be the command? Im still a little linux illiterate
what do you get when you open a terminal and type "which konversation"

ok, put that in the command box.  That should at least open it up for you when you log in.  I haven't used konversation, but I'm sure there are options to autlogin, join channels, etc... that you can append to that if you want.  I would read the man page for those options
but that should at least get konversation running
yes there are options for that. Thank you
no problem, just repeat for anything else you want to start
Yep doing so now :) Learn something new every day from this channel
